name: @zerobias-org/types-atlassian
description: OpenAPI type definitions for Atlassian services

scripts.generate:badge: npx badge $(yq -oy e .name package.json) $(npm run -s get-version) :red @flat > version.svg
scripts.generate:inflate: npx @redocly/cli bundle models.yml --output temp.yml && mv temp.yml models.yml
scripts.sync:meta: VERSION=$(npm run -s get-version) NAME=$(yq -oy e .name package.json) DESC=$(yq -oy e .description package.json) yq e -i '.info.version=strenv(VERSION) | .info.title=strenv(NAME) | .info.description=strenv(DESC)' api.yml
scripts.generate: npm run generate:api && npm run generate:inflate
scripts.version: npm run sync:meta && npm run generate && npm run generate:badge && git add api.yml models.yml version.svg

author: team@zerobias.com
